name: hyperledger-fabric
description: The Hyperledger Fabric service on SAP BTP lets you provision a Hyperledger Fabric node and join it to a network of nodes. Hyperledger Fabric supports Enterprise ready blockchain with smart contracts.

servicePlans.name: backbone
servicePlans.description: Each Hyperledger Fabric network requires exactly one backbone node. This node provisions all Hyperledger Fabric network relevant infrastructure.

servicePlans.name: channel
servicePlans.description: Exposes an existing Hyperledger Fabric channel created by the network administrator in a SAP BTP space for using.

servicePlans.name: cyon
servicePlans.description: Connect Your Own Network (CYON) into the SAP BTP.

servicePlans.name: dev
servicePlans.description: Environment with all relevant APIs for developing and testing of Hyperledger Fabric Chaincode.

servicePlans.name: node
servicePlans.description: Hyperledger Fabric node that must be joined to a Hyperledger Fabric network for active participation.

servicePlans.name: testnet
servicePlans.description: Hyperledger Fabric node which is part of a cross organizational test network available for developing and testing distributed applications. It may not be used productively.
